entry.title: Crystal Collection Silk Eye Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Silk
Price: 40.00

Infuse your savasana with the healing power of crystals. The Crystal Collection Silk Eye Pillow is pure bliss during restorative yoga, before bed, or after screen time. Organic wheat berry, natural gemstones and a lavender fill is naturally cooling, soothes dry eyes, and relaxes the mind and body.

Choose from Moonstone, Citrine

Moonstone is connected to feminine energy—it’s thought to help enhance intuition, creativity, and emotional balance.

Citrine is a crystal associated with confidence, prosperity, and success. It’s thought to help promote self-expression, joy, and motivation.

 

FEATURES

  • Natural gemstones inside

  • Soft silk cover

  • Custom dyed and designed for Halfmoon

  • Relieve eye strain

  • Relax facial tension

  • Soothe dry eyes

  • Calming lavender scent

  • Heatable for the ultimate relaxation (remove cover while heating) 


SPECS

  • 8" x 5" (20.3 cm x 12.7 cm)

  • Cover: 100% silk, sewn in China

  • Casing: 100% organic cotton, sewn in India

  • Filling: 1% lavender (France),  organic wheat berry (Canada), natural gemstones (Brazil)

  • Assembled at Halfmoon just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Wash cover only

  • Remove the cover, hand wash in cold water and hang to dry

  • Do not bleach


HEATING INSTRUCTIONS

Microwave: Remove cover and set aside. Lay the pillow as flat as possible on the turntable and heat in 30-second intervals until you reach your desired temperature. Shake the pillow between intervals for even heating. Test temperature on the back of the hand or forearm before placing it on the neck or face. Do not overheat.

Oven: Remove cover and set aside. If you do not have a microwave, you can heat your pillow up in the oven at 250-300 degrees Fahrenheit at 30-second intervals, until it's at your desired temperature. Please be sure to remove the pillow every 30 seconds to shake around the contents so they do not burn.

entry.title: 4" Hand Hammered Brass Singing Bowl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 78.00

Our Hand Hammered Brass Singing Bowl 4" is a beautiful piece for your meditation space or living room. This bowl fits in the palm of your hand so you can take it with you to practice mindfulness and sound healing anywhere. The bowl produces a resonance that helps calm the mind and relax the body. Singing bowls can be used for meditation, sound therapy, yoga, or any time you wish to ground body and mind.

Beautifully hand-hammered in Nepal, there is social programming available for the makers of these singing bowls and their communities. Programs include scholarships for girls, daily meditation at work, access to bi-annual check-ups, and salary savings programs.

The paper box the singing bowl is packaged in is made from Lokta Paper, a traditional Nepali paper, made from the inner bark of lokta bushes. Historically, this handmade paper has been used for religious and government texts.

The felt cushion ring is included and handmade with 100% mulesing-free New Zealand wool. The ring protects furniture that can be easily scratched and can hold the bowl during use.


FEATURES

  • Convenient size

  • Hand-hammered in Nepal

  • Social programming for the makers and their communities

  • Mindfully created packaging and cushion

  • Great tool for sound healing, meditation, or yoga


SPECS

  • Singing bowl: 4" x 4" x 2.7"

  • Mallet: 5" x 7/8" x 7/8"

  • Felt Ring: 4" x 3/4" x 3/4"

  • Bowl: 100% brass

  • Mallet: wood & suede

  • Ring: 100% mulesing-free New Zealand wool

  • Paper box is made from Lokta Paper: a traditional Nepali paper, made from the inner bark of lokta bushes

  • Made in Nepal


PRODUCT CARE

  • Do not use for eating or drinking

  • Clean with a damp cloth

  • Avoid scratching for quality sound

entry.title: Mindful Moments Crystal Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Crystals
Price: 40.00

Deepen your sense of mindfulness in savasana and feel firmly grounded in ritual through our thoughtfully chosen crystal set designed to enhance the connection to your heart, crown, and solar plexus chakras. Rose Quartz connects to your heart chakra by removing negative energy and inviting in unconditional love while Chevron Amethyst relieves stress and clears the mind. Honey Calcite rounds out the experience as it boosts confidence and encourages inner power. The set comes with a Selenite disc to clear or amplify any energies in the crystals. Place each stone on top of the disc to cleanse and recharge.


FEATURES

  • Comes with Rose Quartz, Chevron Amethyst, Honey Calcite, and Selenite Disc for cleaning and recharging


SPECS

  • Set with Charging Disc and three crystals in a reusable bag

  • Disc: ~3.7-3.9"

  • Crystals: ~1-1.75"

  • All ethically sourced: Amethyst & Rose Quartz from Brazil, Honey Calcite from Mexico, Selenite from Morocco


PRODUCT CARE

  • Fragile, wipe with dry cloth, keep away from moisture or water

  • Do not soak or leave water on the Selenite disc as this may dissolve it

 

NOTES

  • A non-toxic mineral oil has been used during the production of the Selenite disc. This oil ensures a smooth surface and acts as a protective barrier. To remove excess mineral oil, wipe dry with a cloth or paper towel.

  • As the contents are made from natural resources, no two pieces are the same — they will vary in colour, veining, and shape adding to the beauty and uniqueness of the product.
